Comments_List: The course is structured in a way that serves the particular interests of each student. I can only see room for improvement regarding the scope of the course, which sometimes seems a bit too general, as often the material was focused on Morocco and not North Africa as a whole.
I would definitely recommend this course to anyone interested in the MENA region.
Yes. This is an amazing course where you learn and then engage with citizens who are passionate about the material.
